input.sentences: the star looked great on the red carpet .
she blew a kiss at the cameras .
she waved to fans as she headed home .
output.sentences: Kendra looks stunning in her zebra print dress.
You can tell she is really digging herself as she blows a kiss to the reporter.
Paparazzi and fans alike just adore her.
She is so down to earth and sweet, always has a smile on her face.
As she leaves the even she is all smiles for everyone.
